abilities.desc: Tethers Io to an allied unit, granting bonus movement speed to both. When Io restores health or mana, the tethered unit gains a larger portion of that amount. The tether breaks when the allied unit moves too far away, or Io cancels the tether.
abilities.name: Tether
abilities.notes: Io's movement speed matches the tethered unit's.

abilities.desc: Summon five particle spirits that dance in a circle around Io. If a particle collides with an enemy hero, it explodes, damaging all enemy units in an area around it.  Creeps take minor damage from touching a particle spirit, but do not cause them to explode.  When its duration ends, any remaining Spirits explode.
abilities.name: Spirits
abilities.notes: After summoning, Io can call the spirits in and out.

abilities.desc: Io gains bonus attack speed, spell amplification, and HP Regen based on max health.  If Io is Tethered to an ally, that unit also gains the bonuses.
abilities.name: Overcharge

abilities.desc: Sends the spirits closer to you. Can be toggled on and off.
abilities.name: Spirits In

abilities.desc: Sends the spirits farther away from you. Can be toggled on and off.
abilities.name: Spirits Out

abilities.desc: Teleports Io and any tethered ally to any location. After the spell expires Io and any tethered ally will return to their original location. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.
abilities.name: Relocate
abilities.notes: If an allied hero is Tethered, that hero will teleported along with you. You can break the tether at any time to prevent that hero from teleporting with you.

abilities.desc: Break the link to the tethered unit.
abilities.name: Break Tether
